SamPy.resolve.misc.SplitSlicerImagesÂ¶

Splits image slicer FITS files to separate file, one for each slice. Adds some information to the FITS header.

requires:pyFITS
author:Sami-Matias Niemi
contact:sniemi@unc.edu
version:0.1
todo:Make a command line argument reader; file id and y cuts (y1 & y2)

Classes

SplitSlicerImages([logfile]) This class can be used to split slicer images to separate files.
